name: Recipe: Crispy Potato Shrimp Platter
desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Crispy Potato Shrimp Platter.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff>Dish Effects</color>
Restores <color=#37ffff>26–30%</color> of Max HP to the selected character.
Regenerates <color=#37ffff>450–790</color> HP every 5s for the next 30s.
<color=#ffffff>Proficiency</color>
15
<color=#ffffff>Dishes</color>

customize.name: Crispy Potato Shrimp Platter
customize.desc: An attractive-looking pre-meal snack. A spread made from potatoes and berries is placed onto crispy potato slices, and a whole shrimp is then added on top. The fragrant and full-bodied flavors serve to whet the appetite, while the addition of Mint adds a whole other dimension to the mix.

customize.name: Delicious Crispy Potato Shrimp Platter
customize.desc: An attractive-looking pre-meal snack. The moment this enters your mouth, the springiness of the shrimp and the crispiness of the potato slices form a profound contrast. The fluffy potatoes immediately follow up by melding these flavors together, creating a sweet experience that makes you relax, body and soul.

customize.name: Suspicious Crispy Potato Shrimp Platter
customize.desc: An attractive-looking pre-meal snack. Too much time was unknowingly spent being preoccupied with the details of this dish's form. The potato slices that were meant to form the base have already turned soft, detracting greatly from the mouthfeel.

customize.name: Dahlia
customize.desc: Deacon of the Church of Favonius and the Anemo Archon's representative in the church.

customize.name: Chatter of Joyful Nights
customize.desc: Dahlia's specialty dish. "Ahem, I received a divine revelation instructing you to try this," a certain deacon says with a wink, presenting a plate of golden treats. Noting his polite and... somewhat expectant gaze, paired with the aroma of sweet apple cider, one might wonder — is this really divine instruction?

customize.name: Crispy Potato Shrimp Platter
customize.desc: An attractive-looking pre-meal snack. A spread made from potatoes and berries is placed onto crispy potato slices, and a whole shrimp is then added on top. The fragrant and full-bodied flavors serve to whet the appetite, while the addition of Mint adds a whole other dimension to the mix.

customize.name: Mint
customize.desc: A refreshingly cool ingredient. The cool, fresh flavor can cut through the heat of many dishes.

customize.name: Shrimp Meat
customize.desc: A whole piece of deep sea shrimp meat, full of nutrients and bursting with delicious flavor.

customize.name: Potato
customize.desc: A chunky vegetable. A gift from the earth that you never tire of with its multitude of cooking methods.

customize.name: Berry
customize.desc: Small, brightly-colored fruit. They can be found everywhere, and the taste of them wipes the fatigue of a long journey away.
